title: Smoking 3 Ashton's at Once!!!
itunes:title: Smoking 3 Ashton's at Once!!!
description: Today on The Cigar Authority Andy Green from Ashton Cigars joins Dave Garofalo, Mr Jonathan and Producer Chuck where we smoke 3 Ashton cigars at the same time; The Ashton Classic, Ashton La Aroma De Cuba EE, and the Ashton Cabinet. Also joining the boys is Barry "Stats" Stein from www.aCigarSmoker.com to talk about his unique rating system and highly rated 100 cigar which the boys light up later in the show. Finally, the boys smoke last year's winner of Two Guy's Cigar Of The Year, Brickhouse! It's time for the finer things in life... It's time for The Cigar Authority!
